Description: Book of the Dead of Padihorpara; frame 6; Judgement scene in black outline with added red(no text).
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57490) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57490)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1992 Jul-Oct, Norfolk, Swaffham Museum, Ancient Egypt 2013 May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink Pigment Backed: membrane Backed: brown paper Checked for loan to Norfolk 1992 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
